title: SatoPrincess
author: SatoPrincess
content: Day don break for we side even if forum time never knack 12:00. I bring good tidings from the South Pole. E sweet my belle say we no mourn this past year, every one of us dey strong and well to see a new year. Nothing special pass this one. Happy new year to everybody way here from legendary to newbie, I congratulate all of una. E don tay I post here make this year be new beginning for all of us to start afresh.

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.body: Yes oh, this new year go bring sweet sweet things come our way oh, we go continue to grow from strength to strength.

comments.author: CryptocurencyKing
comments.body: I grit una my people wth d blessings of a new year. I tank God 4 d life way we live thru d passing yr nd d life way dey ahead of us. 4 we way way try see dis fresh yr, mak we dey thankful nd see reasons 2 dey catuous nd preserv our life dis yr.I ho stil lik use dis opportunity remind us say, time don dey run nd dat mean say, hustle don start. Mak no bodi dull encef nd hopefully, e go better 4 everybody.Again, na election dey front dey wait us so, vote wisely nd peacefully. As we dey enjoy d natural and fresh amattan AC, Asake say mak I tell una say, "Peace be unto U".Happy New Year My People.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: 2022 wasn't an easy year for Bitcoin and our country Nigeria, but despite all odds, by Gods grace we were able to scale through successfully of which we now celebrate a new year. So on that note, I joined hands with the host of many others to wish my brothers and sisters here on this forum, a Happy New Year 2023. God bless you all.

comments.author: Dzwaafu11
comments.body: Same here I pray may these new year bring success and prosperity for us...We pray the country should be better that before as we start our new year may God show us the way of our success amen.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: It is really impressive to find local communities for Nigerians. Due to Nigeria's presence in cryptocurrency, especially with trading, I believe the country will be able to raise blockchain/cryptocurrency innovation by developers that will be peculiar to Nigeria from this year forward. It's time to move away from scam phone mining in Pi to exchanges that can serve the entire continent. It is important that exchanges allow those wishing to send their stable coins in foreign currency to their banks that accept the same currency, and that it can be implemented in this era.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: No be lie o broda,last year na pain and suffer na e we experience for both crypto market and the world economy, especially for we country,but finally God pass everything as he make us overcome all and we still land ourselves for in 2023.I pray make God use 2023 put smiles for our face and make us recover all our lost of last year in ten folds in Jesus name...AmenHappy Victorious New Year¬† to you all !!!

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHeadlineNews on January 01, 2023, 08:05:53 AM2022 wasn't an easy year for Bitcoin and our country Nigeria, but despite all odds, by Gods grace we were able to scale through successfully of which we now celebrate a new year. So on that note, I joined hands with the host of many others to wish my brothers and sisters here on this forum, a Happy New Year 2023. God bless you all. The graphic designer himself. I really like your graphic works. I don't know why you are not participating on Roobet again after one win. Well last year was a real difficult¬† year to me after¬† di service year at Kano State. But God directed me to this forum through a best friend.¬† I will also use this opportunity to tellüëáQuote from: Dzwaafu11 on January 01, 2023, 09:32:31 AMMay the New Year bring you happiness, peace, and prosperity. Wishing you a joyous 2023! Remember all the good memories you have made and know that your life will be so full of wonders in the coming year. Happy new Year 2023 I pray say may God show us new ways to our success. If you not taking elders advise then do the way you want but please don't spam the board we suffered for. You have been warned time number not to create threads that another person has created, you can simply go there make comments. Not only you is doing this in this board, but I try to advise them one of them quoted the following¬† Quote from: CryptopreneurBrainboss on December 26, 2022, 08:18:14 PM__Bitcoin and economy no suppose get this sub threads as them go reduced the inflow of thread creation for the board but we need am in massive form to keep the board active.Happy new year and prosperous Year to all di 9ja here.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Happy new year to all Naija people wey they for this forum, the year just start so we get enough time to make our plans and try our best to work towards am. Last year no too go well for crypto based on say na bear market we they, but we come end the year in joy as we finally got our own local board, for me that was one of the best news wey happen for this forum last year, and i wan congratulate all of us once more. This 2023 go be our first complete year for our own local board, and i pray say make good things they follow us they go. Happy new year naija, make we continue to they fly our flag high for Bitcointalk.

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHeadlineNews on January 01, 2023, 08:05:53 AM2022 wasn't an easy year for Bitcoin and our country Nigeria, but despite all odds, by Gods grace we were able to scale through successfully of which we now celebrate a new year. So on that note, I joined hands with the host of many others to wish my brothers and sisters here on this forum, a Happy New Year 2023. God bless you all. Same to you brotherly and I wish all of us the same na better things go follow us this year na true you talk the thing no easy at all but we they always survive as Nigerians, na medium to thank everybody for here, na rough year sha but it keeps getting better even as bitcoin done crash we hope say everything to better this year wey we done enter, so make everything set again.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: As we no take mourn peso last year, naso we no go ever mourn peso now and forever (Amen). This year go keep on bringing us good tidings for our life concerning crypto and na soso good good news wey go d hear and see for our side that will unify us to a better being as we always long for, for this forum. Make God keep on blessing us as we represent Nigeria as crypto enthusiasts for this forum. Happy new year to everyone. Make we no forget sae election d around the corner. Make we vote rightly

comments.author: martyns
comments.body: Happy new year to all my brothers wey dey the bitcointalk forum,I pray the new year go bring more beta beta things for us,and I also pray say baba God go make the things wey been hard us last year,easy for us this year.as we go all progress more.Happy new year once again mates.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: Happy new year my good people of naija. Na beta thing say we know hear any bad news concerning any of us for hia even after the year 2022 carry plenty hardship and hunger come our country but oluwa no let any of us die before our time I believe say no good thing wey pass dis one. Even as we dom enta the new year so, make we no forget say time no dey wait for anybody so make we put our ears and eyes to beta information wey go benefit all of us and make we dey try to share more useful information concerning our hustle here so that we fit grab some good opportunities take hold body even as we dey go small small. I officially say welcome to everyone here.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: SatoPrincess on December 31, 2022, 11:38:17 PMDay don break for we side even if forum time never knack 12:00. I bring good tidings from the South Pole. E sweet my belle say we no mourn this past year, every one of us dey strong and well to see a new year. Nothing special pass this one. Happy new year to everybody way here from legendary to newbie, I congratulate all of una. E don tay I post here make this year be new beginning for all of us to start afresh. Happy New Year my people, last year end very well as we achieve wetin we been dun dey find for a very long time. I pray say this year go over fresh for all of us. We go achieve more greater things both on and off the forum. I wan plead with everybody to put hands together make we grow this board together. Engage more in thread creation so we fit dey get discussion to contribute to. We all know how our hangout thread been dey very active with almost new topic daily, make we run am again fo this board so over discussion go worry us. Make we make sure they're topics that'll interest people to contribute to and na well written thread in a quality manner. Already I dun decide to merit every quality thread been created (2 merits) and if theymos here my plead increase my source then I go increase the meriting as well. If we make this board very active then we fit shift to the next request wey be granting us a new merit source. Once again I say a happy new year to everybody, this year we go big and hopefully we go get our educational and financial desires achieved. Cheers to a productive 2023.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: CryptopreneurBrainboss on January 03, 2023, 08:04:06 AMQuote from: SatoPrincess on December 31, 2022, 11:38:17 PMsnipHappy New Year my people, last year end very well as we achieve wetin we been dun dey find for a very long time. I pray say this year go over fresh for all of us. We go achieve more greater things both on and off the forum. I wan plead with everybody to put hands together make we grow this board together. Engage more in thread creation so we fit dey get discussion to contribute to. We all know how our hangout thread been dey very active with almost new topic daily, make we run am again fo this board so over discussion go worry us. Make we make sure they're topics that'll interest people to contribute to and na well written thread in a quality manner. Already I dun decide to merit every quality thread been created (2 merits) and if theymos here my plead increase my source then I go increase the meriting as well. If we make this board very active then we fit shift to the next request wey be granting us a new merit source. Once again I say a happy new year to everybody, this year we go big and hopefully we go get our educational and financial desires achieved. Cheers to a productive 2023.Thank you. I support every endeavor that bring development to our local board, with or without merit source we can do it. I will be focusing here more to find quality post to merit to encourage us so members no go run go outside with good post. Cause if there is no merit flow in this board the quality posters we have will prefer to post good content in the main board where they have more visibility and more chances of getting merit. So far the kind of topics we have are Economy/ politics and society related, I hope with time we will have more discussions across bitcoin, altcoins and politics and society.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Happy new year to you my brothers and friends I thank you all because since wey I joined the forums and started¬† ¬†understand¬† more about bitcoin and other activities and I really appreciate for some una wey dey ahead of us wey still dey give us wey be newbie more confident to discuss in forums, I pray we never lack anything we need and may God make us continue live in peace in forums as one big happy and makes our goals achieve with long life and prosperity.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Though na February I been register to Bitcointalk, but as i see this topic now, I go still want to wish every member a happy new year too, and I pray for better better things to follow us and our family this year, Amenüôè
